title: Anna Deavere Smith
summary: Anna Deavere Smith (born September 18, 1950) is an American actress, playwright, and professor. She is known for her roles as National Security Advisor Dr. Nancy McNally in The West Wing (2000–06), hospital administrator Gloria Akalitus in the Showtime series Nurse Jackie (2009–15), and as  U.S. District Court Clerk  Tina Krissman on the ABC show For the People (2018–19).
